name: copper mana focusing bracelet
description: An ornate copper bracelet covered in magical symbols, crafted and manipulated to act as a focus for magical powers when you are enchanting. This is the second most basic enchanting tool. Activate to say the command word and turn the bracelet into a pencil like tool with a sharp point that you can use to etch magical symbols into other materials.

use_action.msg: You say the command and your bracelet straightens out into a tool.

name: copper mana focuser
description: An ornate copper rod with a fine sharp point covered in magical symbols, roughly the size of a pencil.  Crafted and manipulated to act as a focus for magical powers when you are enchanting.  This is the second most basic enchanting tool, think of it as a magical screwdriver.  You use the sharp point to etch symbols and runes into the substance of what you are enchanting.

use_action.msg: You say the command and your focus turns back into a bracelet.

name: basic mana infuser
description: Formerly a piece of ceramic, it has been reshaped into a small crystal rod.  The internal crystaline structure has been manipulated so that it can infuse mana into other substances, and in small quantities, substances into one another via magic.  It is the most basic tool for enchanting, think of it as a makeshift magical hammer.
